Effect.en:
2+ Warrior monsters
Gains ATK equal to the total Link Rating of all other Link Monsters you control x 200. This Link Summoned card is unaffected by other cards' effects. You can Tribute 1 "Gouki" Link Monster, then target cards on the field, up to that monster's Link Rating; destroy them. You can only use this effect of "Gouki The Powerload Ogre" once per turn.
